# AWS EC2 Client Package #

**aws.ec2** is a simple client package for the Amazon Web Services (AWS) [Elastic Cloud Compute (EC2)](http://aws.amazon.com/ec2/) REST API, which can be used to monitor use of AWS web services.

## Installation ##

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/leeper/aws.ec2.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/leeper/aws.ec2)

To install the latest development version from GitHub, run the following:

```R
if(!require("devtools")){
    install.packages("devtools")
    library("devtools")
}
install_github("cloudyr/aws.ec2")
```

To install the latest version from CRAN, simply use `install.packages("aws.ec2")`.
```
